data.title: Adobe Population Health
data.text:
Whole Person Care Management

Adobe is on a mission to positively impact every life we touch.

We care for employees so they have the capacity to care for members.

We help members help themselves to be well.

Lives We Have Touched

For Medicaid Plans

For Medicare Plans

For ACA Marketplace Plans

The Adobe Care Management Model

%

75% decrease in ER claims over a two-year period

%

33% reduction in claim costs, comparing year-to-year data

%

23% decrease in pharmacy claims, comparing quarterly data

%

9% hospital readmission rate

%

72% HRA completion rate

Our innovative app identifies potential SDOH barriers and connects members to local resources

Testimonials

“Adobe is a positive place to work for. You’re affecting change. This is one agency of many agencies out there that have case management. But not like Adobe. You’re actually in the home and touching their lives and hearts every day.” Zenette, Adobe Employee

“I am in a lot better place than I was before Adobe. Because without Adobe, I don’t know what I would have done. They became my friends. They’re almost like family.” Deborah, Member

“The rising cost of healthcare is a global issue. What Adobe does by providing proactive healthcare not only improves a healthcare delivery but also reduces cost for its partners.” Dan R., Partner
